trans-unit.source: Provides a common implementation of members for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListBox"></xref> and <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox"></xref> classes.
trans-unit.target: Fornece uma implementação comum de membros para o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListBox"> </xref> e <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox"> </xref> classes.

trans-unit.source: The ListControl class provides implementations of common elements for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox> controls.
trans-unit.target: A classe ListControl fornece implementações de elementos comuns para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>controles.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: The following properties are of primary concern to users of a data-bound <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DataSource%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DisplayMember%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.SelectedValue%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.ValueMember%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: As seguintes propriedades são de interesse principal para os usuários de uma associação de dados <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DataSource%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DisplayMember%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.SelectedValue%2A>, e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.ValueMember%2A>Propriedades.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.ValueMember%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.SelectedValue%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DisplayMember%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DataSource%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListControl"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListControl"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the list enables selection of list items.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se a lista permite a seleção de itens de lista.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the list enables list item selection; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a lista permite que a seleção de item de lista. Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager"></xref> associated with this control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager"> </xref> associada ao controle.

trans-unit.source: The DataManager property is valid if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DataSource%2A> property is set.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade DataManager é válida se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DataSource%2A>está definida.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: If this is not a data-bound control, the default is `null`.
trans-unit.target: Se isso não é um controle associado a dados, o padrão é `null`.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager"></xref> associated with this control.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager"> </xref> associada ao controle.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the data source for this <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListControl"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a fonte de dados para este <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListControl"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: There are two ways to fill the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> controls.
trans-unit.target: Há duas maneiras para preencher o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>controles.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>

trans-unit.source: For example, you can add objects to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox> by using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.ObjectCollection.Add%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, você pode adicionar objetos para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>usando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.ObjectCollection.Add%2A>método.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.ObjectCollection.Add%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>

trans-unit.source: You can also add objects to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox> by using the DataSource, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DisplayMember%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.ValueMember%2A> properties to fill the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>.
trans-unit.target: Você também pode adicionar objetos a um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>usando a fonte de dados <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DisplayMember%2A>e as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.ValueMember%2A>Propriedades para preencher <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.ValueMember%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DisplayMember%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>

trans-unit.source: When the DataSource property is set, a user cannot modify the items collection.
trans-unit.target: Quando a propriedade DataSource está definida, um usuário não é possível modificar a coleção de itens.

trans-unit.source: If setting the DataSource property causes the data source to change, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DataSourceChanged> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: Se a configuração da propriedade de fonte de dados faz com que a fonte de dados alterar, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DataSourceChanged>é gerado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DataSourceChanged>

trans-unit.source: If setting this property causes the data member to change, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DisplayMemberChanged> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: Se a definição dessa propriedade faz com que o membro de dados alterar, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DisplayMemberChanged>é gerado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DisplayMemberChanged>

trans-unit.source: When you set DataSource to `null`, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DisplayMember%2A> is set to an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: Quando você define a fonte de dados como `null`, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DisplayMember%2A>é definido como uma cadeia de caracteres vazia ("").</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DisplayMember%2A>

trans-unit.source: An object that implements the <xref:System.Collections.IList> or <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IListSource"></xref> interfaces, such as a <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref> or an <xref:System.Array>.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto que implementa o <xref:System.Collections.IList>ou <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IListSource"> </xref> interfaces, como um <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"> </xref> ou <xref:System.Array>.</xref:System.Array> </xref:System.Collections.IList>

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The assigned value does not implement the <xref:System.Collections.IList> or <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IListSource"></xref> interfaces.
trans-unit.target: O valor atribuído não implementa o <xref:System.Collections.IList>ou <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IListSource"> </xref> interfaces.</xref:System.Collections.IList>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DataSource*> changes.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DataSource*>alterações.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DataSource*>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a manipulação de eventos, consulte [tratamento e gerando eventos](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the property to display for this <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListControl"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a propriedade a ser exibida para esse <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListControl"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The controls that inherit from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl> can display diverse types of objects.
trans-unit.target: Os controles que herdam de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl>pode exibir vários tipos de objetos.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl>

trans-unit.source: If the specified property does not exist on the object or the value of DisplayMember is an empty string (""), the results of the object's `ToString` method are displayed instead.
trans-unit.target: Se a propriedade especificada não existe no objeto ou o valor de DisplayMember é uma cadeia de caracteres vazia (""), os resultados do objeto `ToString` método são exibidas em vez disso.

trans-unit.source: If the new display member cannot be set, the previous display member setting is maintained.
trans-unit.target: Se o novo membro de exibição não pode ser definido, o membro de exibição anterior configuração é mantido.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> specifying the name of an object property that is contained in the collection specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DataSource*> property.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.String>especificando o nome de uma propriedade de objeto que está contido na coleção especificada o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DataSource*>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DataSource*> </xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: O padrão é uma cadeia de caracteres vazia ("").

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DisplayMember*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DisplayMember*>alterações de propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DisplayMember*>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a manipulação de eventos, consulte [tratamento e gerando eventos](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the current value of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListControl"></xref> item, if it is a property of an object, given the item.
trans-unit.target: Recupera o valor atual de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListControl"> </xref> item, se for uma propriedade de um objeto, considerando o item.

trans-unit.source: The object the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListControl"></xref> item is bound to.
trans-unit.target: O objeto de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListControl"> </xref> está vinculado a.

trans-unit.source: The filtered object.
trans-unit.target: O objeto filtrado.

trans-unit.source: Returns the current value of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListControl"></xref> item, if it is a property of an object given the item and the property name.
trans-unit.target: Retorna o valor atual de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListControl"> </xref> item, se for uma propriedade de um objeto, considerando o item e o nome da propriedade.

trans-unit.source: The object the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListControl"></xref> item is bound to.
trans-unit.target: O objeto de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListControl"> </xref> está vinculado a.

trans-unit.source: The property name of the item the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListControl"></xref> is bound to.
trans-unit.target: O nome da propriedade do item de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListControl"> </xref> está associado ao.

trans-unit.source: The filtered object.
trans-unit.target: O objeto filtrado.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the control is bound to a data value.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o controle está associado a um valor de dados.

trans-unit.source: The Format event is raised before each visible item in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl> is formatted.
trans-unit.target: O formato é gerado antes de cada item visível a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl>é formatado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl>

trans-unit.source: Handling this event gives you access to the string to be displayed for this list item, through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControlConvertEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: O evento, você terá acesso à cadeia de caracteres a ser exibido para este item de lista, por meio da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A>propriedade de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControlConvertEventArgs>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControlConvertEventArgs> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a manipulação de eventos, consulte [tratamento e gerando eventos](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref:System.IFormatProvider> that provides custom formatting behavior.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o <xref:System.IFormatProvider>que fornece o comportamento de formatação personalizado.</xref:System.IFormatProvider>

trans-unit.source: Setting the FormatInfo property will override the default formatting behavior, which uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.CurrentCulture%2A> setting.
trans-unit.target: A configuração da propriedade FormatInfo é substituirá a formatação de comportamento, que usa o padrão de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.CurrentCulture%2A>configuração.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.CurrentCulture%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IFormatProvider> implementation that provides custom formatting behavior.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.IFormatProvider>implementação que fornece o comportamento de formatação personalizado.</xref:System.IFormatProvider>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.FormatInfo*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o valor de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.FormatInfo*>alterações de propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.FormatInfo*>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a manipulação de eventos, consulte [tratamento e gerando eventos](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the format-specifier characters that indicate how a value is to be displayed.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define os caracteres de especificador de formato que indicam como um valor a ser exibido.

trans-unit.source: The format string used must follow standard [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] format specifications.
trans-unit.target: A cadeia de caracteres de formato usada deve seguir o padrão [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] especificações de formato.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Formatting Types in the .NET Framework](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [tipos de formatação do .NET Framework](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The string of format-specifier characters that indicates how a value is to be displayed.
trans-unit.target: A cadeia de caracteres de especificador de formato que indica como um valor a ser exibido.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.FormatString*> property changes
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o valor das <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.FormatString*>alterações de propriedade</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.FormatString*>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a manipulação de eventos, consulte [tratamento e gerando eventos](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether formatting is applied to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DisplayMember*> property of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListControl"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se a formatação é aplicada para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DisplayMember*>propriedade o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListControl"> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DisplayMember*>

trans-unit.source: Setting the FormattingEnabled property to `true` causes the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.Format> event to be raised for each visible member of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl>.
trans-unit.target: Definindo a propriedade FormattingEnabled para `true` faz com que o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.Format>evento ser gerado para cada membro visível de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.Format>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.SelectedIndex%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.SelectedValue%2A>, and FormattingEnabled are related as follows: - If FormattingEnabled is `false`, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.SelectedIndex%2A> will not be set to -1 when <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.SelectedValue%2A> is blank.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.SelectedIndex%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.SelectedValue%2A>, e FormattingEnabled são relacionadas da seguinte maneira: - se FormattingEnabled é `false`, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.SelectedIndex%2A>não será definido como-1 quando <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.SelectedValue%2A>está em branco.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.SelectedValue%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.SelectedIndex%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.SelectedValue%2A></xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.SelectedIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: - If FormattingEnabled is `true`, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.SelectedIndex%2A> will be set to -1 when <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.SelectedValue%2A> is blank.
trans-unit.target: -Se FormattingEnabled é `true`, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.SelectedIndex%2A>será definido como-1 quando <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.SelectedValue%2A>está em branco.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.SelectedValue%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.SelectedIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if formatting of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DisplayMember*> property is enabled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a formatação do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DisplayMember*>propriedade estiver habilitada; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DisplayMember*>

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.FormattingEnabled*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o valor de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.FormattingEnabled*>alterações de propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.FormattingEnabled*>

trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Returns the text representation of the specified item.
trans-unit.target: Retorna a representação de texto do item especificado.

trans-unit.source: The object from which to get the contents to display.
trans-unit.target: O objeto do qual obter o conteúdo para exibir.

trans-unit.source: If the property is not specified, the value returned by GetItemText is the value of the item's method. Otherwise, the method returns the string value of the member specified in the property for the object specified in the item parameter.
trans-unit.target: Se o <> *> propriedade não for especificada, o valor retornado por GetItemText é o valor do item de método. Caso contrário, o método retorna o valor de cadeia de caracteres do membro especificado no <> *> propriedade para o objeto especificado no item parâmetro.

trans-unit.source: Handles special input keys, such as PAGE UP, PAGE DOWN, HOME, END, and so on.
trans-unit.target: Gerencia chaves especiais de entrada, como PAGE UP, PAGE DOWN, HOME, END e assim por diante.

trans-unit.source: One of the values of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Keys"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um dos valores de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Keys"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: if the keyData parameter specifies the , , , or key; if the keyData parameter specifies .
trans-unit.target: if the keyData parameter specifies the , , , or key; if the keyData parameter specifies .

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.BindingContextChanged"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Gera o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.BindingContextChanged"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.EventArgs>que contém os dados de evento.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DataSourceChanged"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Gera o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DataSourceChanged"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Gerar um evento invoca o manipulador de eventos por meio de um representante.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [tratamento e gerando eventos](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The OnDataSourceChanged method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: O método OnDataSourceChanged também permite que classes derivadas manipular o evento sem anexar um representante.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Isso é a técnica preferida para manipular o evento em uma classe derivada.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.EventArgs>que contém os dados de evento.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DisplayMemberChanged"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Gera o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DisplayMemberChanged"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Gerar um evento invoca o manipulador de eventos por meio de um representante.

trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [tratamento e gerando eventos](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The OnDisplayMemberChanged method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: O método OnDisplayMemberChanged também permite que classes derivadas manipular o evento sem anexar um representante.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Isso é a técnica preferida para manipular o evento em uma classe derivada.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.EventArgs>que contém os dados de evento.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.Format"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Gera o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.Format"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Gerar um evento invoca o manipulador de eventos por meio de um representante.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [tratamento e gerando eventos](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The OnFormat method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: O método Formatar também permite que classes derivadas manipular o evento sem anexar um representante.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Isso é a técnica preferida para manipular o evento em uma classe derivada.

trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListControlConvertEventArgs"> </xref> que contém os dados de evento.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, resynchronizes the data of the object at the specified index with the contents of the data source.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituído em uma classe derivada, sincroniza novamente os dados do objeto no índice especificado com o conteúdo da fonte de dados.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the item whose data to refresh.
trans-unit.target: O índice de base zero do item de dados para atualizar.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, resynchronizes the item data with the contents of the data source.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituído em uma classe derivada, sincroniza novamente os dados de item com o conteúdo da fonte de dados.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets or sets the zero-based index of the currently selected item.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituído em uma classe derivada, obtém ou define o índice de base zero do item atualmente selecionado.

trans-unit.source: A zero-based index of the currently selected item.
trans-unit.target: Um índice com base em zero do item atualmente selecionado.

trans-unit.source: A value of negative one (-1) is returned if no item is selected.
trans-unit.target: Um valor negativo um (-1) será retornado se nenhum item selecionado.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the value of the member property specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.ValueMember*> property.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o valor da propriedade do membro especificado o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.ValueMember*>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.ValueMember*>

trans-unit.source: If a property is not specified in <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.ValueMember%2A>, SelectedValue returns the results of the `ToString` method of the object.
trans-unit.target: Se uma propriedade não for especificada em <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.ValueMember%2A>, SelectedValue retorna os resultados de `ToString` método do objeto.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.ValueMember%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.SelectedIndex%2A>, SelectedValue, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.FormattingEnabled%2A> are related as follows: - If <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.FormattingEnabled%2A> is `false`, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.SelectedIndex%2A> will not be set to -1 when SelectedValue is blank.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.SelectedIndex%2A>, SelectedValue, e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.FormattingEnabled%2A>são relacionadas da seguinte maneira: - se <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.FormattingEnabled%2A>é `false`, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.SelectedIndex%2A>não será definido como -1 quando SelectedValue está em branco.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.SelectedIndex%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.FormattingEnabled%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.FormattingEnabled%2A></xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.SelectedIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: - If <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.FormattingEnabled%2A> is `true`, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.SelectedIndex%2A> will be set to -1 when SelectedValue is blank.
trans-unit.target: -Se <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.FormattingEnabled%2A>é `true`, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.SelectedIndex%2A>será definido como -1 quando SelectedValue está em branco.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.SelectedIndex%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.FormattingEnabled%2A>

trans-unit.source: An object containing the value of the member of the data source specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.ValueMember*> property.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto que contém o valor do membro da fonte de dados especificado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.ValueMember*>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.ValueMember*>

trans-unit.source: The assigned value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> or the empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: É o valor atribuído <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> ou cadeia de caracteres vazia ("").

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.SelectedValue*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.SelectedValue*>alterações de propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.SelectedValue*>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a manipulação de eventos, consulte [tratamento e gerando eventos](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, sets the object with the specified index in the derived class.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituído em uma classe derivada, define o objeto com o índice especificado na classe derivada.

trans-unit.source: The array index of the object.
trans-unit.target: O índice de matriz do objeto.

trans-unit.source: The object.
trans-unit.target: O objeto.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, sets the specified array of objects in a collection in the derived class.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituído em uma classe derivada, define a matriz de objetos especificada em uma coleção na classe derivada.

trans-unit.source: An array of items.
trans-unit.target: Uma matriz de itens.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the path of the property to use as the actual value for the items in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListControl"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o caminho da propriedade a ser usado como o valor real para os itens a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListControl"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Specify the contents of the ValueMember property in cases where you bind data.
trans-unit.target: Especifique o conteúdo da propriedade ValueMember em casos em que você pode associar dados.

trans-unit.source: You can clear the ValueMember property by setting the property to an empty string ("") or `null`.
trans-unit.target: Você pode limpar a propriedade ValueMember, definindo a propriedade como uma cadeia de caracteres vazia ("") ou `null`.

trans-unit.source: Setting a new ValueMember property raises the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.ValueMemberChanged> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.SelectedValueChanged> events.
trans-unit.target: Configuração de uma nova propriedade ValueMember gera o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.ValueMemberChanged>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.SelectedValueChanged>eventos.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.SelectedValueChanged> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.ValueMemberChanged>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> representing a single property name of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DataSource*> property value, or a hierarchy of period-delimited property names that resolves to a property name of the final data-bound object.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.String>que representa um nome de propriedade único o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DataSource*>o valor da propriedade ou uma hierarquia de nomes de propriedade delimitados que resolve um nome de propriedade do objeto de associação de dados final.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DataSource*> </xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: O padrão é uma cadeia de caracteres vazia ("").

trans-unit.source: The specified property path cannot be resolved through the object specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DataSource*> property.
trans-unit.target: O caminho da propriedade especificada não pode ser resolvido por meio do objeto especificado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DataSource*>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DataSource*>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.ValueMember*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.ValueMember*>alterações de propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.ValueMember*>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a manipulação de eventos, consulte [tratamento e gerando eventos](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.
